This innovation enables the station to provide real-time Spanish, Portuguese, and Korean translations synchronized with originally broadcast English audio. The implementation involved reconfiguring the Ateme encoder at KNMD-TV (Santa Fe), which now sends English audio streams to LingoPal's cloud service for translation. The translated audio is returned in a 2.0 downmix format, maintaining lip-sync with the video broadcast.

This capability enhances accessibility and public safety communication, particularly during emergencies, by allowing New Mexico PBS to communicate critical information to non-English speaking viewers. The technological upgrade, completed in about an hour (excluding preconfiguration by LingoPal), demonstrates seamless integration into existing workflows without additional complexity or heavy resource requirements. HVS and New Mexico PBS continue to expand the reach and functionality of ATSC 3.0, which began with KNMD-TV’s transition to the new standard in June 2021. HVS will showcase this system at the 2025 NAB Show New York.","ref_id":{"turn_index":0,"ref_type":"news","ref_index":41},"pub_date":1760718848,"attribution":"www.tvtechnology.com"}]},{"type":"search_result","url":"https://www.tvtechnology.com/news/brightcove-unveils-new-features","title":"Brightcove Unveils New AI Features","snippet":"Brightcove has announced the release of seven new AI-powered features aimed at expanding global access, increasing engagement, enhancing live-streaming quality, and optimizing video workflows. These updates are part of a larger rollout of 12 tools introduced recently, and nearly 150 customers are already testing the new capabilities. A major highlight is the upgraded AI Suite, including a Universal Translator that supports video localization in over 50 languages and offers refined dubbing options such as synthetic and speaker-modeled voices. 

The Auto-Captions feature now offers greater accuracy and customization through the addition of a brand-sensitive dictionary. Another notable tool, Metadata Optimizer, enhances searchability and SEO by analyzing text, audio, and visuals, with support for over 40 languages. 

For mobile engagement, a new Vertical Videos gallery template enables swipeable video feeds on company websites. response_text: Here are some of the best video translation tools for agencies (fast, scalable, and suitable for professional content workflows in 2026):  Top Picks for Agencies  1) Synthesia – Best overall for professional video translation, studio-level dubbing with realistic voice cloning and high-quality lip sync; strong workflows for teams. Synthesia+1 [https://www.synthesia.io/post/best-video-translator-apps]  2) HeyGen – Excellent language coverage (175+ languages), solid lip sync and voice cloning; good choice if you need wide global reach. Feisworld Media+1 [https://www.feisworld.com/blog/best-ai-video-translation-tools]  3) Smartcat – Enterprise-grade translation platform with auto subtitling, AI dubbing and huge language support (280+); ideal for agency localization pipelines. Smartcat [https://www.smartcat.com/video-translation/]  4) Perso AI – Affordable and fast with multi-speaker detection, voice cloning, and lip sync; scales well for client projects (supports many formats). Perso+1 [https://perso.ai/]  5) Dubly AI – High-precision voice cloning, glossaries for brand consistency, editable translations; good for broadcast-style output. Dubly.AI+1 [https://dubly.ai/blog/the-best-video-translation-software-in-2025-comparison-recommendation]  Other Useful Options  • Canva AI Video Translator – Quick AI translation with simple workflows (good for marketing/social content). Canva [https://www.canva.com/features/ai-video-translator/]  • Adobe Firefly Translate Video – Integrated in Adobe ecosystem (20+ languages; useful if you already use Adobe tools). adobe.com [https://www.adobe.com/products/firefly/features/translate-video.html]  • Veed / Kapwing – All-in-one editors with basic translation + dubbing for fast turnaround social content. Synthesia+1 [https://www.synthesia.io/post/best-video-translator-apps]  What to prioritize for agencies  • Speed & batch processing – auto-translate large volumes fast.  • Voice cloning & lip sync – natural output preferred by clients.  • Multi-speaker and file format support – for interviews/panel content.  • Team & workflow features – multi-user access, glossaries, brand controls. Perso [https://perso.ai/blog/ai-video-translator-tools-for-agencies-side-by-side-comparisons]  Want me to recommend based on budget range or specific use (e.g., social vs corporate)?
